  • Constructor Details

    • Notification

      public Notification()
      Default constructor required for Firestore data mapping. Firestore uses this constructor when deserializing documents from the database.

    • Notification

      public Notification(String title, String message, String eventId, String fromOrganizeremail, String eventName, String groupType)
      Constructs a new Notification with all required fields.
      Parameters:
      title - The title/heading of the notification
      message - The detailed message content of the notification
      eventId - The unique identifier of the related event
      fromOrganizeremail - The email of the organizer who sent the notification
      eventName - The display name of the related event
      groupType - The category or group this notification belongs to (e.g., "Waiting List", "Chosen Entrants")

    • Notification

      public Notification(String title, String message, String eventId, String fromOrganizeremail, String eventName, String groupType, int recipientCount)
      Constructs a new Notification with all required fields and recipient count.
      Parameters:
      title - The title/heading of the notification
      message - The detailed message content of the notification
      eventId - The unique identifier of the related event
      fromOrganizeremail - The email of the organizer who sent the notification
      eventName - The display name of the related event
      groupType - The category or group this notification belongs to (e.g., "Waiting List", "Chosen Entrants")
      recipientCount - Number of recipients this notification targeted
